"air.be.gymfed.gymstarsapp"	"Gymstars"	"50"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Gymnastics is an outstanding sport to improve the motor skills of children. In addition, it offers plenty of creativity, challenges, possibilities for social contacts and opportunities to develop one’s personality. In primary school, gymnastic exercises play a key role in the physical education teaching package.<br>Thanks to the financial assistance of the Flemish Government, the Gymnastics Federation of Flanders has developed a didactical and methodical programme for physical education teachers and trainers of recreation groups in gymnastics clubs. <br><br>Through the GymStars-project the Gymnastics Federation would like to contribute to a uniform and high-quality sports education for children and young people in Flanders. The ultimate goal is achieving ‘excellent performances of children in accordance with their own possibilities.’<br><br>The programme was developed for children in the age group of 6 to 14 years (including 1 or 2 training sessions per week) and is composed of 5 movement themes. These constitute the basis of 66 movement skills (Skill cards), which are approached in 6 levels and comprise 1200 exercises (tracks, variations, progresses, …). <br><br>The GymStars app allows effortless navigation through the various levels, as well as movement themes and exercises. It pays attention to the methodology of the basic movements of elementary apparatus gymnastics (floor, plinth, balance beam/parallel bars, asymmetrical bars/horizontal bar).<br>Per Skil card, the tracks offer a large amount of preparatory exercise material allowing you to teach each movement. We start with the forward roll (level 1) and end with the forward somersault (level 6). The didactical tips are supplied to help the teacher training the basic elements, giving the necessary feedback and offering variations and remedial exercises. "air.pool.billiards.v1d"	"Hot! 8 Ball Online Free Pool Game 2019"	"5000000"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Eight-ball (often spelled 8-ball or eightball or 8 ball or 8 ball pool, and sometimes called solids and stripes, spots and stripes in the UK, more rarely, bigs and littles/smalls, highs and lows, halves and wholes) is a poolgame popular in much of the world, and the subject of international professional and amateur competition. Played on a billiard table with six pockets, the game is so universally known in some countries that beginners are often unaware of other biliard games and believe the word ""pool"" itself refers to billar. The game has numerous variations, mostly regional. Standard eight-ball is the second most competitive professional bilhar game, after bilyar, and for the last biliard decades ahead of straight biliardo.<br><br>Snooker is a cue sport which originated among British Army officers in Etawah, India in the later half of the 19th century. It is played on a rectangular table covered with a green cloth, or baize, with pockets at each of the four corners and in the middle of each long side. Using a cue and 22 coloured balls, players must strike the white ball (or ""billard"") to pot the remaining balls in the correct sequence, accumulating points for each pot. An individual game, or frame, is won by the player who scores the most points. A match is won when a player wins a predetermined number of frames.<br><br>Nine-ball (sometimes written 9-ball) is a contemporary form of pool (pocket billiards), with historical beginnings rooted in the United States and traceable to the 1920s.The game may be played in social and recreational settings by any number of players (generally one-on-one) and subject to whatever rules are agreed upon beforehand, or in league and tournament settings in which the number of players and the rules are set by the sponsors. During much of its history, nine-ball has been known as a ""money game"" in both professional and recreational settings, but has since become established as a legitimate alternative to eight ball, straight pool and other major competition games.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"39615"

"alex.podcast"	"Rasenfunk (inoffizielle App)"	"100"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Diese App ermöglicht euch einen schnellen Zugriff auf alle drei Sendungsformate des Rasenfunks und einen bequemen Zugang zu seiner Community. Auf Wunsch werdet ihr auch direkt benachrichtigt, wenn neue Folgen erscheinen.<br><br>Weiterhin könnt ihr, wenn ihr mal weniger Zeit habt, euch selbst automatisch eure eigene Schlusskonferenz zusammenstellen lassen mit den Teams, die euch an jeden Spieltag besonders interessieren oder auch in den Episoden nur die Segmente auswählen, die euch besonders interessieren.<br><br>Wichtige Information: Die App ist nicht direkt vom Rasenfunk selbst. Solltet ihr also Rückfragen oder Feedback zur App haben, nutzt bitte die unten angegebene Email.<br><br>Im Rasenfunk geht es um Fußball. Es gibt den Rasenfunk seit 2014, Frank Helmschrott und Max-Jacob Ost produzieren ihn.  In verschiedenen Formaten besprechen sie aktuelle, aber auch zeitlose und übergreifende Themen. Sie nehmen sich dabei Zeit und konzentrieren sich auf das Sportliche. Der Rasenfunk ist frei von Sponsoren und Werbung und wird alleine von seinen Hörerinnen und Hörern finanziert. <br><br>Das sind die drei Sendungsformate:<br><br>Schlusskonferenz:<br>In der Schlusskonferenz blickt Max mit Sportjournalisten, Podcastern und Fans auf bedeutsame Spiele zurück. So gibt es zum Beispiel zu jedem Bundesligaspieltag eine eigene, ausführliche Folge. Die Gäste wechseln dabei ebenso wie die Schwerpunkte - jeder Verein kommt im Laufe der Saison mal dran. Höhepunkt der Bundesligasaison ist der “Rasenfunk Royal”, in dem Max halbjährlich mit je einem Gast pro Bundesligaverein Bilanz zieht.<br><br>Tribünengespräch:<br>Doping im Fußball, die Geschichte der Fußballtaktik, ausführliche Spielerinterviews – im Tribünengespräch widmet Max sich je einem Thema intensiv. Die Folgen sind zeitlos und manchmal recht umfassend. Dafür weiß man danach über einen Aspekt des Fußballs genau Bescheid. Prima für Podcast-Neulinge geeignet – hier ist für jede und jeden etwas Interessantes dabei!<br><br>Kurzpass:<br>Der Kurzpass ist der Quickie: Ein Gast, ein Moderator, ein Thema – fertig ist der kurzweilige Blick auf Aktuelles und Bemerkenswertes aus der Welt des Fußballs. Die Themen sind breit gestreut und sicher manchmal auch überraschend. Zu großen Turnieren wie Welt- und Europameisterschaften gibt es den Kurzpass gerne auch mal täglich.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"3"
"america.Basketball.Championship"	"American Basketball Playoffs"	"500000"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">American Basketball Playoffs  is a basketball simulation video game!its gameplay simulates a typical game of basketball, with the player controlling an entire team or a select player; objectives coincide with the rules of basketball and presentation resembles actual televised American national basketball games. Various game modes have been featured in the game, allowing for gameplay variety. Numerous elements of the games feature customizable options. <br>American Basketball Playoffs is a limited-contact sport game played on a rectangular court. While most often played as a team sport with five basketball players on each side, three-on-three, two-on-two, and one-on-one competitions are also common. The objective is to shoot a basketball (approximately 9.4 inches (24 cm) in diameter) through a hoop 18 inches (46 cm) in diameter and 10 feet (3.048 m) high that is mounted to a backboard at each end of the court. American Basketball  was invented in 1891 by Dr. James Naismith.<br>A basketball  team can score a field goal by shooting the basketball  through the basket being defended by the opposition team during regular play. A field goal scores three points for the shooting team if the basketball player shoots from behind the three-point line, and two points if shot from in front of the line. A basketball team can also score via free throws, which are worth one point, after the other team is assessed with certain fouls. The basketball team with the most points at the end of the basketball game wins, but additional time (overtime) is mandated when the score is tied at the end of regulation. The basketball can be advanced on the court by passing it to a teammate, or by bouncing it while walking or running (dribbling). It is a violation to lift, or drag, one's pivot foot without dribbling the ball, to carry it, or to hold the ball with both hands then resume dribbling.<br>American basketball game has many individual techniques for displaying skill—ball-handling, shooting, passing, dribbling, dunking, shot-blocking, and rebounding. Basketball teams generally have player positions, the tallest and strongest members of a team are called a center or power forward, while slightly shorter and more agile basketball players are called small forward, and the shortest basketball players or those who possess the best basketball handling skills are called a point guard or shooting guard. The basketball point guard directs the on court action of the team, implementing the coach's game plan, and managing the execution of offensive and defensive plays (player positioning).</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"2199"

Spiele, Tabellen, Ergebnisse, Statistiken:</u><br>Wähle aus den angebotenen Verbänden deine Lieblingsteams und -ligen aus und füge sie zu deinen Favoriten hinzu. Greife bequem über die Favoriten-Ansicht auf deren Spieltage, Ergebnisse und Statistiken zu und gebe jedem Favorit ein individuelles Bild. Auch auf die Tabellen, Spiele und Ergebnisse von Teams oder Ligen, die nicht zu den Favoriten hinzugefügt worden sind, kann über die Suchfunktion zugegriffen werden.<br><br><br><u>2. News:</u><br>Für einige Verbände werden alle wichtigen Neuigkeiten innerhalb des Verbands angezeigt.<br><br><br><u>3. Taktikeditor:</u><br>Mit dem integrierten Taktikeditor können Aufstellungen erstellt werden und Informationen in den Hintergrund geschrieben werden. Zusätzlich können die Aufstellungen animiert werden, wodurch Laufwege und Abläufe verdeutlicht werden können.<br>Die erstellten Taktiken können dann gespeichert, geladen und als Bild exportiert werden.<br>Für mehr Details zur Verwendung des Taktikeditors bitte unsere Webseite (https://volleyball-vsg.de/index.php/spielgemeinschaft/mein-volleyball-app)/ Facebookseite (https://facebook.com/meinVolleyball) besuchen.<br><br><br><b><u>Erklärung der Berechtigungen:</u></b><br>- Voller Netzwerkzugriff: Zugriff auf Spielergebnisse, News, Spiele etc...<br>- Netzwerkverbindung abrufen: Netzwerkstatus abfragen und somit unnötige Wartezeiten vermeiden<br>- Standortzugriff: Zeige Spiele in deiner Nähe<br>- SD-Karteninhalte lesen: Lesen der Bilder, die den Favoriten zugeordnet werden können<br>- Kalendertermine lesen: Um beim Speichern der Spiele im Kalender Duplikate zu vermeiden, wird zunächst geprüft, ob ein äquivalenter Eintrag bereits existiert<br>- Kalendereinträge hinzufügen: alle zukünftigen Spiele einer Mannschaft können im Kalender gespeichert werden<br>- Beim Start ausführen: Empfange Benachrichtigung über Spielergebnis auch nach einem Neustart<br><br><br><b><u>HINWEIS:</u></b><br>Diese App wurde nicht im Auftrag eines Verbandes entwickelt, sondern ist ein Freizeitprojekt. The same old stickhandling drills get boring and you can't afford a private stickhandling instructor. Well.... you can now!<br><br>DangleTime is your private stickhandling coach on your phone. Anytime you want to work on your stickhandling just pull out your phone and get training. <br><br>The app keeps track of your ""DangleTime"" which is the amount of time you spend practicing using the app. This time can be shared and compared with friends. Who can get the highest DangleTime? The higher your DangleTime the more you can level up, go from a Duster to an All-Star!<br><br>The app comes with 3 free training packs. Each training pack contains 8 stickhandling drills. When you select a training pack a drill will play for 20 seconds with a 10 second break and then the next drill will play until all drills in that pack have played. These times can be adjusted in the settings menu. <br><br>If you'd like more stickhandling drills you can purchase them and continue to challenge yourself and improve your stickhandling. <br>All drills are demonstrated by Jeremy Rupke from How To Hockey with plans to add new drill packs from more hockey instructors. <br><br>Show me your DangleTime with #DangleTime on Instagram and Twitter and follow me @howtohockey</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"132"

"appinventor.ai_1954gellis.progessivemetres_checkpoint1"	"Progressive metres calculator"	"50"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">UCI regulations govern the maximum distance that the cycle can travel in one complete turn of the pedals. e.g. Age 10  max progressive metres is 5.4 mts. The formula to calculate progressive is ( Number of  chainring teeth / Number of sprocket teeth ) x Outside circumference of wheel. With this calculator you can quickly calculate the progressive metres then if required alter the three variables of  tyre, chainring and sprocket size to obtain the optimum progressive metres for the age of the rider.<br><br>Simply select a tyre size from the available list, select an age group from the list, enter  chainring and smallest sprocket size then calculate. <br><br>If your tyre size is not available use the next size up for the calculation.<br><br>At time of publication the outside circumference of available tyres were correct as were the UCI maximum progressive metres regulations regarding age groups</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"0"

"appinventor.ai_JanCeesVenema.Paragliding_Pilot_Retrieve"	"Paragliding Pilot Retrieve"	"100"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">If you are a XC paragliding pilot, you might land in a different location than anticipated. In this case you have to inform the retrieve team where they can pick you up or just inform them on your status.<br><br>This app determines your location and sends a message with a few clicks using SMS, Whatsapp, Messenger, or whatever communication tool is available on your android device.<br><br>The location information is presented in the what3words format. More info on what3words below.<br><br>How to use the app<br><br>Step 1. Switch on your GPS<br><br>Step 2. Start the Paragliding Pilot Retrieve app<br>If you forgot to switch on GPS, a message will be displayed and you will get an audio (voice) warning. After having enabled the GPS, give it 20-45 seconds to perform an accurate location fix. The location will be presented in 3 words (what3words format). A voice will inform you on the location updates.<br><br>Step 3. Select message text<br>Click on the ‘Select message’ bar. Now a new screen opens and will display a list of 12 messages of which you can select one. Just click on the required message and you will be returned to the main screen.<br><br>Step 4. Send message without location<br>If you have selected a text stating e.g. that you are making your own way back or are back at base, there’s no need to add location information. In that case just click the ‘Share message’ bar. Your smartphone will now open a screen allowing you to select the messaging service you want to use. Follow the steps indicated by the messaging app. The app will send the selected message, but will allow you to add more text if you like.<br><br>Step 5. Send message with location<br>If you want to also send the location information, the message contains the selected text,  your location and a clickable map link. Click the lower ‘Share message &amp; location’ bar. Your smartphone will now open a screen allowing you to select the messaging service you want to use. Follow the steps indicated by the messaging app. The app will send the selected message, but will allow you to add more text if you like.<br><br>Minimal data transfer<br>The app is designed to be extremely ‘light’ on the data transfer, in order to cope with marginal internet connections often encountered in the field. To get the w3w address only 150 bytes are transferred. Also around 150 bytes are sent in the retrieve message.<br><br>What if there’s no internet connection?<br>In this case the what3words address cannot be determined and most of your messaging services won’t work. Except one: SMS. That’s why the app also provides the lat/lon values along with the what3word address. Your GPS works independent of your internet connection, as does SMS. So that’s the fallback option. You will still get your location and message across.<br><br>Mind the GPS performance<br>Obviously the app is meant to be used in open spaces, our natural flying habitat. Thus reception of the GPS signals is optimal and allows for accuracies of several meters. The app is not meant to be used indoors.<br><br>Why what3words?<br>w3w divides the world into a grid of 3m x 3m squares and assigned each one a unique 3 word address. It means anyone can accurately find any location and share it more quickly, easily and with less ambiguity than any other system. Especially if a location has to be communicated by phone, it is far more easy then using the standard lat/lon figures. More info on w3w can be found at http://what3words.com/</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"0"

"appinventor.ai_sibkin42.PuttingEye"	"ゴルフ グリーン傾斜計 パットアイ"	"50"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">「パットアイ」は、単に傾斜面の高い位置の方向を示す水準器のような<br>デザインではなく、ゴルファーにとって直観的なデザインとしました。<br><br>パッティング位置で画面の矢印をカップへ向けてデバイスを置いてください。<br>置いた場所の傾斜を読み取り、ボールの転がりイメージとして、その度合いを表現します。<br><br>錯覚効果によってグリーン全体の傾斜がいったいどうなっているのか<br>判断が難しい場合など、カップに向かってスライスなのか、フックなのか、<br>上りなのか、下りなのかという大まかな判断を直観的に行えます。<br><br>デフォルトではデバイス搭載の傾きセンサーに準じるようになっていますが、<br>これらのセンサーにズレを感じている場合や、お使いのケースやカバーによって<br>デバイスを水平状態にできない場合は、独自の水平状態を記録することができます。<br>設定ボタン（画面右下のギアアイコン）をタップしてキャリブレーション画面から<br>水平状態を記録できます。<br>「デバイスのセンサーに準じる」のチェックを外し、デバイスを水平と思われる<br>場所に置いて水平状態記録ボタンをタップします。<br><br>※あくまでデバイスを置いた位置の傾斜にしたがって転がりイメージを<br>表示するものであり、芝目や通過点の傾斜を考慮した分析を<br>おこなうものではありません。<br>したがって、カップまでの正確なラインを表示するものではありません。<br>スネークラインなどの場合、通過点の傾斜も測るなどして<br>総合的な判断が必要となります。<br><br>※無料版の公開を再開いたしました。<br><br>このアプリの開発者は、安心・安全なアプリの開発者であるとしてアンドロイダーの公認デベロッパーに認証されています。<br>https://androider.jp/developer/cd40d280013eb84e4c8d32f054c83680/<br><br>アンドロイダー内紹介ページ<br>https://androider.jp/official/app/0e092631a715af8b/</div>"	"0.99"	"Sports"	"0"

It has not just one, but two, voice countdowns (5-minute and 3-minute). This complete set of features is only available in the Pro version. <br><br><br>Sailing Race Starts Pro is designed for all Android devices, works equally well on phones and tablets, and has many features! Die Ergebnisse sind vom Sportler bzw. dessen Betreuer einzutragen. Diese werden dann vom Administrator freigegeben.<br><br>Ranking-Punkte werden immer nach oben gerundet, bis zu einem Maximum von 2 Dezimalzahlen.<br><br>Ranking-Verfall: Jedes Jahr werden von den Ranking Punkten 25% gestrichen (Stichtag: Tag des Wettbewerbes)<br><br>Ranglisten werden nur für Kategorien mit mindestens 2 Teilnehmern erstellt.<br><br>Ranking Bewertung<br><br>Basierend auf folgenden Fakten:<br>• Anzahl der Teilnehmer (Gesamt)<br>• Anzahl der Wettkämpfer ausserhalb des Ausrichterlandes<br>• Anzahl der Continentalen/Welt Kampfrichter<br><br>Ein Turnier kann auch den Ranking Status vom Präsidium aberkannt bekommen wenn die Anforderungen nicht erfüllt werden.<br><br>Ranglistenpunkte – Basis Werte<br><br>• 1. Platz: 70 points<br>• 2. Platz: 50 points<br>• 3. Platz: 30 points<br>• 4. Platz: 25 points<br>• 5. Platz: 20 points<br>• Gewonnene Kämpfe: 8 Punkte (je gewonnen Kampf)<br>• Teilnahme: 4 Punkte<br><br>* Für den Fall, dass es zwei dritte Plätze gibt, erhalten beide je 30 Punkte.<br><br>Ranglistenpunkte Multiplikator (Event Faktor)<br><br>Die Basis Punkte werden multipliziert mit den Event Faktor um die finalen Ranking Punkte zu erhalten.<br>• 0 WAKO Turnier geringerer Wertigkeit<br>• 1-2 WAKO Deutschland anerkanntes Turnier<br>• 2-3 WAKO Deutschland C-Serie Turnier<br>• 3-4 WAKO Deutschland B-Serie Turnier<br>• 4-6 WAKO Deutschland A-Serie Turnier<br>• 6-7 WAKO World Cups und ausgewählte Internationale Events<br>• 10 Deutsche Meisterschaft und German Open<br>• 12 WAKO Welt- und Europameisterschaften / World Games / Combat Games<br>• 15 Olympische Spiele</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"5"

"at.production.sportdata.wmmaaranking_app_papers"	"WMMAA Ranking"	"50"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">WMMAA Ranking overview<br><br>Basics<br><br>Ranking will only apply to categories that exist in the official WMMAA events.<br><br>Ranking points will always round up or down to a maximum of 2 decimal numbers.<br><br>Ranking decay (4 Year Cycle): Each Year (from the day the competitor received the ranking points of an event) a deduction applies to the ranking points equal to 25%<br><br>Ranking will be applied only to categories with a minimum of seven (7) Competitors<br><br>Ranked Championships Evaluation<br><br>Championships are evaluation based on the following facts:<br>• Number of competitors (total)<br>• Number of competitors participated outside the host country<br>• Number of Continental/World Level Judges and Referee<br><br>An event may also be removed from the ranking status with executive committee decision if none of the WMMAA level requirements are met.<br><br>Ranking Points Base Values<br><br>• 1st place: 70 points<br>• 2nd place: 50 points<br>• 3rd place: 30 points<br>• 5th place: 20 points<br>• Fight Won: 8 points / per fight won<br>• Participation: 4 points<br><br>* in the case of a draw with 3rd and 4rth place instead of repasage 30 points will be awarded to both these places)<br><br>Ranked Championship Values (Event Factor)<br><br>The base values will be multiplied with the Event Factor to have the final ranking points.<br>• 2 WMMAA Accredited Competiton<br>• 3 World Cup<br>• 6 Continental Championships<br>• 8 Invitational Events (World Games, Martial Art Games)<br>• 10 WMMAA World Championship</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"0"

"au.com.idfish.app"	"iDfish"	"1000"	"3.4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">iDfishTM is a smart device application that provides you with reliable and consistant data when out in the field doing what you love best. Fishing!<br> <br>Quickly identify fish, determine the regulated size limit (if applicable), eating quality and if it should be released because of its' protection status.  All this information can be obtained in less than 60 seconds and the fish returned to the water, with the best possible chance of survival.<br> <br>iDfishTM has the largest database of line caught species for mobile applications in the world.  All the images of fish within the database are high quality and high resolution.  The developers of iDfishTM  have gone to great lengths to represent the displayed fish images as they would appear when freshly caught and removed from the water.  No tank or underwater photos.  No photos of dead fish.  No illustrations.  This is essential for a quick and accurate fish ID.<br> <br>Fish change colour, shape and size for a variety of reasons and in an effort to make sure we give you, the angler,  the best possible chance of accurate fish identification, we also provide different colour phases of various species.  This feature, coupled with species comparison information, makes this previously difficult task to identify a fish quick and easy.<br> <br>This application works offline and does not require an internet connection to ID a fish.  Any trip information recorded will automatically back up to your account when an internet connection is re-established.  <br><br>All fishing regulations for all lined fish species in Australia are inluded in the application and are available in an offline capacity.  These regulations a checked daily by your application to ensure that you are up-to-date with all you legislative obligations.  <br><br>If you are unable to get a fish ID, there  is a built in facility that allows you to send an image of the fish to the iDfishTM team.  The team will use multipul resourses to ID fish that you send and get back to you via email with the fish identification information.<br> <br>Additional features include:<br>Tide times for all tide stations throughout Australia (No internet connection required)<br>Almanac with fish displayed and recorded on a solunar clock<br>Trip log to record all your fishing trips with photos and information of fish caught<br>Catch details where all information of a catch can be recorded including size, weight, tag number, weather at the time of capture, fishing line class etc.<br>Third party ranking of your catch - submit a photo of a fish for ranking against other Anglers.<br>Follow your friend's progress and fishing trips.<br>Join Challenges and test your fishing skills.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"60"

Getting Started<br><br>**SIMPLE RULES FOR COMPLETE BEGINNERS:<br>1.The absolute basics<br>2. Setting up a badminton court<br>3.Singles, doubles, and mixed doubles<br>4. Serving --- How to serve<br><br>5.Service courts ---- How service courts are used<br>**LAWS OF BADMINTON:<br>1.TOSS<br>2.SCORING SYSTEM<br>3.CHANGE OF ENDS<br>4.SERVICE<br>5.SERVICE COURT ERRORS<br>6.FAULTS <br><br>7.LETS<br>8.CONTINUOUS PLAY, MISCONDUCT &amp; PENALTIES<br>9..OFFICIALS AND APPEALS<br>**BASIC BADMINTON RULES FOR ALL LEVELS<br>1.Who serves at ‘Love All’?<br>2. In Out Boundaries (Singles and Doubles)<br>3. Serving and Receiving – Where to Stand? <br>4. Badminton Scoring System – 21 Points<br>5. Badminton Fouls or Fault<br><br>**BADMINTON SINGLE RULES<br>1.	At the beginning of the game (0-0) and when the server’s score is even, the server serves from the right service court. When the server’s score is odd, the server serves from the left the service court.<br>2.	If the server wins a rally, the server scores a point and then serves again from the alternate service court.<br>3.	If the receiver wins a rally, the receiver scores a point and becomes the new server. He/she serves from the appropriate service court – left if his/her score is odd, and right if it is even.<br><br>** BADMINTON DOUBLE RULES<br>1. Each side has only one “set”<br>2. At the beginning of the game and when the score is even, the server serves from the right service court. When it is odd, the server serves from the left court.<br>4. If the serving side wins a rally, the serving side scores a point and the same server serves again from the alternate service court.<br>5.If the receiving side wins a rally, the receiving side scores a point. <br>6.The players do not change their respective service courts until they win a point when their side is serving.<br><br>**RULES FOR BADMINTON AND SCORING<br><br>//GENERAL RULES:<br>1.	You should not serve until the opponent is ready, but if he/she attempts to return the serve, he/she is considered ready and play continues.<br>2.	If in serving, you miss the shuttlecock, you may serve again providing your racquet did not make any contact during the attempt.<br>3.	Birdies that hit the net as they cross during play are good and should be played.<br>4.	If, in serving, the shuttle touches the net, it is a “let” provided the service is otherwise good and the birdie is served again.<br>5.	Birdies that fall on the line are considered good.<br>//SCORING<br>1.	A match consists of best-of-three games to 21 points.<br>2.	At 20 all, the side which gains a two-point lead first wins the game.<br>3.	At 29 all, the side scoring the 30th point wins that game.<br>4.	The side winning a game serves first in the next game.<br>5.	Every time there is a serve, there will be a point scored, unless that point is replayed.<br>6.	A two-minute break between each game is allowed.<br><br><br>**Badminton Service Rules<br>**Simplified Badminton Rules and Regulations<br><br>We have Ebook Recommendations as well as a place to submit your Own game tips and get a chance to be featured in this app.<br><br>**BADMINTON RULES APP TEAM**<br>**UPDATED REGULARLY**<br>**FREE FOR LIMITED PERIOD ONLY**</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"47"

With Bike Fit Calculator: size my bike, you can get the right measures for your bike's frame.<br><br>Defining the correct measures for the frame and adjustments of our bicycle is essential when preparing our travel companion. <br><br>By having the correct size of our bike frame, we will avoid many injuries caused by incorrect measurements, which cause bad posture, bad gestures and overexertion on the bicycle.<br><br>Entering the measures of your body, you will obtain in an easy and simple way the size that the frame of the bicycle should have.<br><br>Previously the frames of the bike were geometrically square or the average horizontal tube the same as the vertical. Luckily, this is no longer the case, biomechanical studies allow us to calculate the appropriate bicycle size for each cyclist. This determines that horizontal and vertical tubes will no longer always be the same, and the angles of the frame will also be modified. The arrival of sloping has also influenced the length and angles of the horizontal tube.<br><br>People of the same height can have different measures in parts of their body so you should not use frames with the same geometry and dimensions.<br><br>To know the ideal measurements that your bicycle frame should have, you must know your anthropometric measurements and introducing these into the application, you will immediately get all the sizes you need.<br><br>Our application provides some approximate measures but that does not mean that you should follow the letter to the letter, it is always better to perform a biomechanical study.<br><br>To be able to use the Bike Fit Calculator: size my bike, you must obtain the measurements of your body, your height, the length of your leg, the length of your arm, shoulders, trunk, ...<br><br>Main characteristics:<br>Bike Fit calculator: size my bike<br><br>▶️ Intuitive interface.<br>▶️ Measures for men and women.<br>▶️ Measures for road or mountain bikes<br>▶️ Detailed image of each of the measures.<br>▶️ You can save as many measurements as you want.<br>▶️ You can share the results.<br>▶️ You can change between centimeters and inches.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"299"

"biz.mewe.mobile.sportstimer"	"SportsTimer Lite"	"100000"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">SportsTimer Lite, a timekeeping app, offers multiple stopwatches for different types of real-life action. Whether you're a single athlete wanting to time yourself, or you're in charge of timing multiple participants at once, this versatile app is up to the challenge.<br>This is the Lite version with NO ads, but limitations in the usage.<br>PRO and EVENT version are also available in Google Play!<br><br>The ""LapTimer"" function is your single-athlete stopwatch. Record all your laps and stay informed about each lap performance. This stopwatch can be controlled in all situations--even while you're moving--because it offers optional tactile feedback and additional control through the volume buttons. At the end of the action, you can check all your lap times, send the complete time history to your friends, or save it to your device's SD card. Your time history is saved in a file format that can be even opened and edited in Excel.<br><br>""MultiTimer"" is the stopwatch you'll use for a larger race or event. It supports simultaneous recording of up to 3 participants (PRO up to 12, EVENT up to 100), and it's easy to set up. Before you start, enter the number and name of each participant (by typing, accessing them in your device's contact list or importing from a csv-list). You can time each athlete individually, the entire event at once, or by an interval phase. As the event is in progress, check the intermediate standings with the ""hotlist"" function. As with the LapTimer, you can document the event by exporting the intermediate and final results to your SD card.<br><br><br>FEATURE LIST:<br><br>LapTimer<br><br> - 3 independent stopwatches <br> - recording of laps &amp; elapsed times<br> - shows delta to best lap time<br> - Tactile feedback<br> - Control stopwatches by volume buttons<br> - Different layouts for landscape and portrait mode<br><br>MultiTimer<br><br>- General<br>   - Simultaneous recording of interim and final results <br>      of up to 3 (Pro: 12, Event: 100) participants<br>   - Organization of participants<br>       - Naming option for participants<br>         - Direct text input<br>         - Import event name, name and start number <br>           from a csv-file<br>         - Select a contact. <br>           -&gt; Shows name and image<br>       - Save configuration<br>       - Events can be classified wit three labels<br>       - Results saving to CSV file <br>         - event (name, label), <br>         - date, <br>         - name of participant<br>   - Timing<br>       - Start Options<br>         - Manual start of each participant<br>         - Simultaneous launch of all participants<br>         - Automatic purging start of all participants<br>         - Optional countdown before total / interval Start<br>      - Simultaneous recording of<br>         - interim and <br>         - final results <br>   - Hotlist shows the ranking <br><br><br>Parallel Timer<br><br>   - offers two stopwatches<br><br><br>Options<br><br>Sharing result options<br>  -Save results to SD-card in csv-format<br>  -Sharing results via email, twitter etc<br>  -Saving results in internal database (up to 1000 results)<br><br>Interface options<br> - Setup orientation mode<br> - Setup timing format: <br>   Set your numbers of digits or add day information<br> - Choice specific timermode as startscreen</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"618"

Weight loss can either occur unintentionally due to malnourishment or an underlying disease or arise from a conscious effort to improve an actual or perceived overweight or obese state. ""Unexplained"" weight loss that is not caused by reduction in calorific intake or exercise is called cachexia and may be a symptom of a serious medical condition. Intentional weight loss is commonly referred to as slimming.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"147"

Position yourself in a plank position (support your body with your toes and place your hands underneath your shoulders with elbows extended) to perform push-ups with a tempo twenty times per minute. <br>The second way is dynamic. Position yourself parallel to the floor with a deflection in the spine (the pelvis is lowered to the floor) to perform push-ups at a rate of 60 to 80 times per minute.<br>The suggested technique allows you to increase the number of push-ups in 10 times.<br>For example, you can perform 10 push-ups. Opine sobre as transferências, compartilhe com os seus amigos do Facebook e fique antenado em toda movimentação não apenas do mercado do futebol no Brasil, mas também no mundo inteiro. O Vai e Vem do Futebol permite que você personalize o seu tablet ou celular para que você exiba as informações da maneira que mais lhe agrada. Adicione filtros por clube ou status da negociação.<br><br>- Interface simples e intuitiva<br>- Acompanhe o Vai e Vem do mercado do futebol<br>- Transferências nacionais e internacionais de jogadores<br>- Personalize a listagem configurando e aplicando filtros de sua preferência<br>- Avise os seus amigos das novidades do mercado, compartilhando as informações de maneira imediata<br>- Dê a sua opinião aprovando ou reprovando as transações<br>- Atualização diária</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"45"

"br.com.marcosdiasvendramini.mdv.placarbrasileirao"	"Placar Brasileirão Série A 2019 - Classificação"	"500"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Com o aplicativo Placar do Brasileirão - Série A de 2019, você pode acompanhar em tempo real o resultado e placares dos jogos e ver classificação do campeonato brasileiro de 2019. Veja também todos os campeões do brasileirão.<br><br>Placar do Brasileirão - Série A, com os campeões, resultados e classificação da primeira divisão do campeonato brasileiro.<br><br>O Campeonato Brasileiro de Futebol, também conhecido como Campeonato Brasileiro, Brasileirão e Série A, é a liga brasileira de futebol profissional entre clubes do Brasil, sendo a principal competição futebolística no país. É por meio dela que são indicados os representantes brasileiros para a Copa Libertadores da América (juntamente com o campeão da Copa do Brasil).<br><br>Devido às peculiaridades históricas e a grande dimensão geográfica do país, o Brasil tem uma história relativamente curta de competições nacionais de futebol. Apenas em 1959, como estabelecido em 1955, foi criado um torneio nacional com a finalidade de apontar o clube campeão brasileiro da temporada, a Taça Brasil. Em 1967, o Torneio Rio-São Paulo foi expandido para incluir equipes de outros estados, ficando conhecido como Torneio Roberto Gomes Pedrosa, e passando a ser considerado uma competição nacional. Em 1971, a CBD iniciou um novo torneio nacional, o Campeonato Nacional de Clubes, torneio este, que foi considerado, entre 1974 e 2010, pela entidade máxima do futebol brasileiro como sendo a primeira edição do Campeonato Brasileiro. Em seus boletins oficiais entre 1971 e 1973, a CBF colocava as edições do ""Robertão"" em igualdade de condições com as edições posteriores do Campeonato Brasileiro, apenas mantendo os nomes próprios, excluindo esta informação a partir do boletim de 1974. Em dezembro de 2010, a CBF unificou a Taça Brasil, disputada de 1959 a 1968, e as edições de 1967 a 1970 do Torneio Roberto Gomes Pedrosa/Taça de Prata ao Campeonato Brasileiro pós 1971. O primeiro campeão brasileiro foi o Bahia em 1959.<br><br>Uma das características históricas do Campeonato Brasileiro foi a falta de uma padronização no sistema de disputa, que mudava a cada ano, assim como as regras e o número de participantes. Dentre os vários formatos já adotados incluem-se sistema eliminatório (1959-1968) e sistemas mistos de grupos (1967-2002). A fórmula de disputa do campeonato foi padronizada somente em 2003, quando foi adotado o sistema de pontos corridos com todas as equipes se enfrentando em turno e returno. O Palmeiras é o time com maior número de títulos brasileiros, com dez conquistas; desde a criação do certame, em 1959, dezessete clubes já foram campeões brasileiros, doze por mais de uma vez, de sete estados e nove cidades diferentes, sendo que apenas o estado de São Paulo teve campeão por mais de uma cidade, três no total (Campinas, Santos e São Paulo), e apenas a cidade do Rio de Janeiro teve mais de três clubes campeões, quatro deles (Botafogo, Flamengo, Fluminense e Vasco da Gama). Características estas que demonstram o nível de competitividade do campeonato.<br><br>O Campeonato Brasileiro é uma das ligas mais fortes do mundo, contando entre seus integrantes habituais com a participação do maior número de clubes detentores de títulos de ""campeões mundiais"", com onze campeonatos ganhos por 7 clubes, o segundo em termos de quantidade de títulos da Copa Libertadores da América, com dezoito títulos conquistados por 10 clubes e ainda outros 3 finalistas, atrás em títulos apenas da Primera División Argentina, com 25 títulos conquistados por 8 clubes e um nono clube finalista.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"6"

It is currently the second most important championship in European football, behind only the UEFA Champions League.<br><br>The precursor of the UEFA Cup, the Cities Fairs Cup, was established on 18 April 1955. In 1971 the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA) took over the organization and changed the format and name of the competition for the UEFA Cup . However, it is not considered a new version of the competition and its titles are not equivalent to the current championship.<br><br>The tournament has a somewhat different format from the UEFA Cup, and now has 48 participating teams, divided into 12 groups, with the top two in each group joining the eight third-placed Champions League groups.<br><br>As is already the case in South America, UEFA has decided to include a berth for the European Champions League in the next edition of the UEFA Champions League, only taking place from the 2014-15 season. No ar desde 1952, conta com uma programação voltada para esportes, sempre presente na cobertura de grandes eventos,  jornalismo, prestação de serviços e entretenimento.<br><br>A programação integral é retransmitida pelo canal 411 de rádio da Sky e 174 da Claro TV, e pode ser acessada de qualquer lugar do mundo, através da Internet, pelo site: www.itatiaia.com.br. Também pode ser ouvida através de aplicativos para smartphones e outros dispositivos móveis.<br><br>Rede Itatiaia – A maior rede de rádios de Minas<br><br>A Rede Itatiaia, uma das redes de comunicação mais sólidas do país, é composta pela Rádio Itatiaia AM/FM - com transmissão simultânea em Belo Horizonte e região metropolitana -, e mais quatro emissoras em Minas Gerais, localizadas em Juiz de Fora, Montes Claros, Ouro Preto e Varginha.<br><br>A maior rede de emissoras mineira detém cerca de 90% de audiência de transmissões esportivas e transmite, via satélite, o melhor do jornalismo e esporte da Rádio Itatiaia. Possui um público diversificado, de jovens e adultos, homens e mulheres, e atinge todas as classes sociais e econômicas.<br><br>As rádios que compõem a Rede Itatiaia buscam ainda se identificar com a cultura de cada local em que atuam, com programação diversificada e prestando serviços à comunidade, se tornando assim um importante meio de informação e entretenimento para o público mineiro.<br><br>Pioneira na transmissão via internet, atualmente, todas as integrantes da Rede Itatiaia possuem site próprio, onde o ouvinte pode acompanhar as programações ao vivo de qualquer lugar do mundo.<br><br>Os links estão disponíveis no site www.itatiaia.com.br.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"7168"

"br.sc.mgr.itstriker"	"ITStriker - EVALUATE CAPACITY AND AEROBIC POWER"	"10"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Designed for combat sports athletes!<br><br>With this App you can identify indirectly and in a specific way the two main aerobic indicators obtained during a maximum test evaluation: maximum oxygen consumption (VO2max), maximum capacity that an individual can get, transport and use the oxygen as energy, and it represents a measure of aerobic power and the anaerobic threshold (AT), which represents a measure of aerobic capacity of the athletes.<br>The AT is the intensity of exercise in which the flow of lactate presents a breaking point of linearity and comes to accumulate more intensely than previously. In low instensity exercise, there is a balance between the speed of lactate production and removal. Knowing and controlling the AT individually is very important for combat sports athletes.<br>With ITStriker you can identify the athlete's AT using the Heart Rate Deflection Point (PDFC) and the corresponding Strikes frequency of anaerobic threshold (SFAT) or Pace, a specific variable related to combat sports.<br>The SFAT or Pace allows you to identify specific training threshold to improve your specific cardio condition required in combat sports. Control and improvement of your Pace will help you to delay the timing of a high concentration lactate levels in the blood and will allow you to improve the tolerance and efficiency of removing these levels of lactate concentration in the blood. This directly reflects its performance, since lactate is directly associated with the increase in metabolic acidosis due to the higher concentration of H+ ions and, consequently, fatigue and reduction of the technique's efficiency and power of combat.<br>ITStriker still assists you in designing and controlling a training program, where you can create training rounds at different relative intensities. From the specific Pace or FGLan, you can determine the effort/pause ratio and the volume of your training program, always using characteristic motor gesture of combat sports.<br><br><br> Features of ITStriker<br><br>Determines indicators of your aerobic capacity and power:<br><br>•	maximum heart rate<br>•	maximum strike frequency<br>•	maximum oxygen consumption<br>•	anaerobic threshold heart rate<br>•	strike frequency of anaerobic threshold<br><br>    Benefits and Use:<br><br>•	•	automatically detects your heart rate<br>•	determines training volume and intensity<br>•	determines the effort/pause ratio (training pace)<br>•	assists in cardiorespiratory fitness<br>•	test indicators history</div>"	"7.49"	"Sports"	"6"

In low instensity exercise, there is a balance between the speed of lactate production and removal. Knowing and controlling the AT individually is very important.<br>With Safe Runner you can identify your AT from the Heart Rate Deflection Point (HRDP) and the corresponding running speed of anaerobic threshold (VAT) or Pace, a specific variable related to the improvement of your aerobic training.<br>The VAT or Pace allows you to identify specific training thresholds to improve specific running performance, aerobic power and capacity indicators, and increase your energy expenditure throughout your aerobic training session, which will lead you to get the best results.<br>Safe Runner still assists you in designing and controlling a training program, where you can create aerobic training programs at different relative intensities. "br.sc.mgr.treaction"	"TReaction - Get your reaction time precisely."	"50"	"4.9"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Designed for athletes, coaches, personal trainers and sport scientist involved with martial arts and combat sport modalities.<br><br>This app helps you to identify in a specific form your reaction time in visual stimulus. TReaction offers you a precise measure of your motor response to different kicks and punch techniques used in martial arts and combat sports such as Boxing, Muay Thai, Karate, Taekwondo and Kickboxing. <br><br>TReaction capture and provide it in milliseconds the time you take to reach a punching bag or a pad with your strikers after a visual stimulus.<br><br>The Reaction Time or Response Time (RT) is an important variable to any combat sports and martial arts especially in visual stimulus. RT can be defined as the time interval between to show a no-anticipated stimulus and the required time to realize the movement after stimulus. In combat sports and martial arts the RT can be defined as the time interval that the athlete takes to came a stimulus and the response to target taking a hit. It represent too a total time that a individual take to make decision and start the action. Therefore it shows a measure of speed indicator in the information processing. It is one of the most important measure in the human capacity in different situations.<br><br>TReaction helps you in the elaboration and control program training, where you can take a training program to develop your RT. With this App you can determine program training to measure and improve you RT in different kicks and punching techniques.<br><br>Technique to Different Martial Arts and Combat Sports:<br><br>•	Boxing<br>•	Karate<br>•	Taekwondo<br>•	Muay Thai<br>•	Kickboxing<br><br>System Features:<br><br>•	reaction time of kicks (RTK)<br>•	reaction time of punchs (RTP<br>•	visual stimulus<br>•	captures the response time in different materials (punching bag, knocker, etc.)<br><br>The TReaction App has been undergone validation tests performed at the Biomechanics Laboratory of the Federal University of Santa Catarina and presents a Typical Error of Measurement of 1.4% (9.4ms) in relation to the measurement performed with high-speed camera with sampling frequency of 1000 frames per second.</div>"	"4.49"	"Sports"	"9"

The application features similar functionality to the website with a design that prioritizes mobile devices.  Android users can access the FEI Equine Prohibited Substances Database from the palm of their hand.  The application requires that users connect to the internet through a cellular or wifi signal. <br><br>The purpose of the FEI CleanSport Prohibited Substances Database is to make a clear distinction between the use of routine, legitimate medication and deliberate and calculated doping to affect a horse’s performance; the FEI has published Guidelines to assist treating and team veterinarians. Inappropriate use of substances is also a threat to the health and welfare of the horse. The purpose of this database is to help you identify prohibited substances under FEI regulations. Information such as a substance definition, common usage, and common trade names are available. <br><br>You must be aware that the list of trade names is not exhaustive, but it reflects the most common trade names in various countries. The trade names used may be different in your country. Therefore it is imperative you always use the database to check for active substances rather than trade names. Gespielt wird auf den Eisbahnen in der Region Bern und teilweise noch im Kanton Freiburg.<br>Die Plauschliga ist grundsätzlich offen für alle Frauen und Männer, welche Freude am Eishockey haben. "ch.bfh.ti.baspo.ll"	"Cross-country skiing technique"	"1000"	"4.3"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">The cross-country skiing techniques app offers a comprehensive insight into current techniques in the sport. Members of the Swiss national team demonstrate all the steps in both the classic and the skating style.<br><br>The app is intended especially for team leaders and trainers but also for ambitious skiiers who would like to improve their technique. Short videos show how to execute the individual steps correctly from several different perspectives - in real time, slow motion and with diagrams. In order to study individual movement sequences in greater detail, it is possible to move the pictures both forwards and backwards individually.<br><br>Still pictures with explanatory texts illustrate the crucial phases of the movement and help users improve their technique so as to ski more efficiently.<br><br>Once the app has been downloaded, the videos can be played without an Internet connection. Thanks to its functional design, the app can be used directly on the ski trail.</div>"	"4.99"	"Sports"	"79"

Mit ihr bist du über das Spielgeschehen in den nationalen Volleyball-Ligen immer bestens informiert - auch unterwegs!<br> <br>FEATURES<br>* Top aktuell: Mit lediglich einem einzigen Tap hast du den vollen Überblick über aktuellste Resultate und anstehende Matches der nächsten Spieltage.<br><br>* Detaillierte Ranglisten: Wenn dir Rang, Anzahl gespielte Spiele und die Punktezahl deines Lieblingsteams nicht ausreichen, solltest du dein Handy drehen! Im Querformat werden zusätzlich die Anzahl verlorener und gewonnener Spiele sowie Ball- und Satzquotient angezeigt.<br><br>* Informativer Spielplan: Nach Spieltagen geordnet werden alle Spieler deiner Lieblingsgruppe übersichtlich mit Heim- und Gastteam, Anspielzeit und Resultat aufgelistet. Einfach ein Spiel antippen um noch mehr Infos zu erhalten!<br><br>* Präzise Resultate: Neben der übersichtlichen Satz-Schreibweise kannst du sämtliche Resultate auch ganz detailliert analysieren - Punkt für Punkt.<br><br>* Mobiliar Topscorer: Verfolge das Gerangel um die hart umkämpften Plätze an der Spitze der Mobiliar Topscorer-Liste direkt auf deinem Handy.<br><br>* Cornèrcard Volley Cup: Jede Runde, jedes Spiel und jedes Resultat des Cornèrcard Volley Cup direkt in deiner Hosentasche!<br><br>* Zweisprachig: Ohne die App zu verlassen kann direkt zwischen deutscher und französischer Sprache gewechselt werden - c'est chic!<br><br>* Optischer Leckerbissen: Dank dem schlichten Design in unseren Verbandsfarben wirkt die App aufgeräumt und übersichtlich - jedes Detail kommt zur Geltung ohne aufdringlich zu sein.<br><br>* Liga-Abdeckung: Nationale Ligen (NLA, NLB und 1. "chart.ecdis.com"	"Electronic Chart Symbols ECDIS"	"1000"	"4.4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">QUICK REFERENCE GUIDE TO THE SYMBOLS USED ON ELECTRONIC (ECDIS) NAUTICAL CHARTS SPECIFIED BY THE INTERNATIONAL HYDROGRAPHIC ORGANIZATION (IHO).<br><br>************ FEATURES and BENEFITS ************<br>- Perfect for reference, learning &amp; revision <br>- Hi-res graphics<br>- Tap &amp; Enlarge feature for greater detail<br>- Fully searchable index to all the symbols<br>- Always with you on your Phone or Tablet<br>- No internet connection needed<br>- How to navigate safely!<br><br>************ Plus FREE Bonus Content from our ""Safe Skipper"" app ************ <br><br>""ELECTRONIC NAUTICAL CHART SYMBOLS &amp; ABBREVIATIONS"" provides quick reference to the ""INT 1"" symbols specified by the International Hydrographic Organization (IHO) on how to navigate safely.<br><br>There are five main sections in this app, each with lettered sub-sections organized into categories to guide users through the hundreds of symbols. The main sections are: <br><br>GENERAL - chart layouts, positions, distances, directions and compass. <br><br>TOPOGRAPHY - landmarks, ports and coastal land features. <br><br>HYDROGRAPHY - tides, currents, depths, nature of the seabed, underwater obstructions, tracks, areas, limits and hydrographic terms. <br><br>NAVIGATION AIDS &amp; SERVICES - lights, buoys, fog signals, radar, radio, services and small craft facilities. <br><br>INDEX &amp; ABBREVIATIONS - international abbreviations and index to symbols and abbreviations. <br><br>************* FREE Bonus Content from ""Safe Skipper"" ***************************** <br>A bonus section has tips on how to deal with emergencies including: Abandon ship; Dismasting; Distress Signals; Engine Failure; Fire Fighting; Flares; Getting a tow; Helicopter rescue; Holed hull; Man overboard; Medical emergency; Mayday; Panpan; Securité.<br><br>INDEX The index is an A-Z of symbols and abbreviations and enables the user to quickly look up the symbols and see them in context with others in the same categories. <br>This app is based on the United Kingdom Hydrographic Office's print publication ""Chart 5011 (INT 1) EDITION 2"" Admiralty Charts Publication and ""Chart No.1 United States of America Nautical Chart Symbols, Abbreviations and Terms"". <br><br>We have an on-going program of marine navigation and boating safety and reference apps, so please contact us with any ideas or features that you would like to see included.</div>"	"2.49"	"Sports"	"18"

"classic.soccer.league.afc.cup"	"Scores for AFC CUP - Asia Second clubs competition"	"100"	"1"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Easy-to-use and simple interface. <br><br>- Live scores and results<br>- Standings and rankings<br>- Scorers and goals details<br>- All matches of a team with a click<br>- Information about a player, like when the matches when he scored<br>- Previous seasons - statistics from last years<br><br>The AFC Cup is an annual International association football competition between domestic clubs run by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). Qualification to the competition is available to clubs from AFC-affiliated countries that fall into the AFC's 'developing nations' category as laid out in their 'Vision Asia' document.[1] Countries which are 'emerging' nations are eligible to participate in the AFC Cup qualifying play-off, where as countries which have better infrastructure and football prowess are entered into the AFC Champions League.<br><br>The 'developing nations' are the fourteen 'next-best' countries that lie outside the top-14 countries in the AFC region which send their clubs to the more prestigious AFC Champions League. Before the reform in competition format that took place in 2009, the two competitions were not interlinked as the UEFA Champions League and the UEFA Europa League are in Europe, and AFC Champions League losers did not compete in the Cup. Following the reform in 2009, finalists of the AFC Cup meeting AFC's criteria and certain other eligible teams are allowed to compete in the qualifying round of AFC Champions League with the losers demoted to play in the AFC Cup.<br><br>Al-Kuwait are the most successful club in the competition's history, having won three titles. Clubs from Kuwait have won four titles, making them the most successful nation in the competition. Ever since the inauguration of the competition in 2004, the finalists of each edition have been dominated by clubs from West Asia until 2015 when the Malaysian team Johor Darul Ta'zim from East Asia became one of the finalists and became champions. Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya are the current champions after defeating FC Istiklol in the final to win the 2017 AFC Cup.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"1"

"classic.soccer.league.concacaf.champs"	"Scores for Concacaf Champions League"	"500"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Easy-to-use and simple interface. <br><br>- Live scores and results<br>- Standings and rankings<br>- Scorers and goals details<br>- All matches of a team with a click<br>- Information about a player, like when the matches when he scored<br>- Previous seasons - statistics from last years<br><br>The CONCACAF Champions League is an annual continental club football competition organized by CONCACAF for the top football clubs in North America, Central America, and the Caribbean. The winner of the CONCACAF Champions League qualifies for the FIFA Club World Cup. The tournament is officially known as the Scotiabank CONCACAF Champions League, since February 2015, due to sponsorship by Scotiabank. The competition has been completed 52 times through the 2016–17 event, with 54 champions due to a three-way shared title in the 1978 competition.<br><br>The tournament's current format uses a knockout format, though the tournament had a group stage prior to the 2018 tournament. Unlike its European and South American counterparts, the winners of the CONCACAF Champions League do not automatically qualify for the following season's competition.<br><br>The competition was originally known as the CONCACAF Champions' Cup when it was first organized in 1962. The title has been won by 28 different clubs, 17 of which have won the title more than once. Mexican clubs have accumulated the highest number of victories, with 34 titles in total. The second most successful league has been Costa Rica's Primera División with six titles in total. Mexican side Club América are the most successful club in the competition's history with seven titles, followed by fellow Mexican-side Cruz Azul with six titles. The most successful non-Mexican club is Saprissa of Costa Rica with three titles. The only four teams to successfully defend the trophy are all Mexican: América, Cruz Azul, Pachuca and Monterrey. The current champions of the competition are Guadalajara, who defeated Toronto FC in the finals.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"1"

It will be held in Brazil. The winner of the tournament will earn the right to compete for the 2021 Confederations Cup. Chile will be the defending champions.<br><br><br>Originally, the 2019 Copa América was to be hosted by Chile, while Brazil was due to host the 2015 Copa América, due to CONMEBOL's rotation policy of tournaments being held in alphabetical order. However, due to the organization of the 2013 Confederations Cup, 2014 FIFA World Cup and the 2016 Summer Olympics in that country, Brazil decided against also hosting the 2015 Copa América. Brazil and Chile's Football Federations discussed the idea of swapping around the order of being hosts of the 2015 and 2019 championships. This agreement was approved by CONMEBOL in 2012.<br><br>The 2019 Copa America will be the final edition played on odd years. Starting in 2020, the tournament will be held in the same year as similar tournaments such as the UEFA European Championship.<br><br>On 16 March 2018, it was announced that from 2020, a new competition between CONMEBOL and CONCACAF will be played. The first edition will be hosted by the United States.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"8"
"classic.soccer.league.conmebol.copa.libertadores"	"Scores for Copa Libertadores - CONMEBOL Football"	"100"	"0"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Easy to use and simple interface.<br><br>- Live Scores and Results<br>- Ranking and ranking<br>- Scorer and goal details<br>- One click to play all of your team<br>- Player information such as the game at the time of scoring<br>- Last season - Last year's statistics<br><br><br>The CONMEBOL Libertadores, named as Copa Libertadores de América (Portuguese: Copa Libertadores da América or Taça Libertadores da América), is an annual international club football competition organized by CONMEBOL since 1960. It is one of the most prestigious tournaments in the world and the most prestigious club competition in South American football. The tournament is named in honor of the Libertadores (Spanish and Portuguese for liberators), the main leaders of the South American wars of independence, so a literal translation of its name into English would be ""Liberators of America Cup"" or ""Liberators of the Americas Cup"".<br><br>The competition has had several different formats over its lifetime. At the beginning, only the champions of the South American leagues participated. In 1966, the runners-up of the South American leagues began to join. In 1998, Mexican teams were invited to compete, and have contested regularly since 2000, when the tournament was expanded from 20 to 32 teams. Today at least four clubs per country compete in the tournament, while Argentina and Brazil each have six clubs participating. Traditionally, a group stage has always been used but the number of teams per group has varied several times.<br><br>In the present format, the tournament consists of six stages, with the first stage taking place in early February. The six surviving teams from the first stage join 26 teams in the second stage, in which there are eight groups consisting of four teams each. The eight group winners and eight runners-up enter the final four stages, better known as the knockout stages, which ends with the finals anywhere between November and December. The winner of the Copa Libertadores becomes eligible to play in the Club World Cup and the Recopa Sudamericana.<br><br>Independiente of Argentina are the most successful club in the cup's history, having won the tournament seven times. Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with 24 wins, while Brazil has the largest number of different winning teams, with a total of 10 clubs having won the title. The cup has been won by 24 different clubs, 13 of which have won the title more than once, and won consecutively by six clubs.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"0"
"classic.soccer.league.conmebol.sudamerica"	"Scores for Copa Sudamericana - CONMEBOL Football"	"100"	"3.7"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Easy to use and simple interface.<br><br>- Live Scores and Results<br>- Ranking and ranking<br>- Scorer and goal details<br>- One click to play all of your team<br>- Player information such as the game at the time of scoring<br>- Last season - Last year's statistics<br><br><br>The CONMEBOL Sudamericana, named as Copa Sudamericana is an annual international club football competition organized by the CONMEBOL since 2002.[1] It is the second-most prestigious club competition in South American football. CONCACAF clubs were invited between 2004 and 2008. The CONMEBOL Sudamericana began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur (that before replaced Copa CONMEBOL) by a single competition. Since its introduction, the competition has been a pure elimination tournament with the number of rounds and teams varying from year to year.<br><br>The CONMEBOL Sudamericana is considered a merger of defunct tournaments such as the Copa CONMEBOL, Copa Mercosur and Copa Merconorte. The winner of the Copa Sudamericana becomes eligible to play in the Recopa Sudamericana. They gain entry onto the next edition of the Copa Libertadores, South America's premier club competition. They also contest in the Supercopa Euroamericana and the Suruga Bank Championship.<br><br>The reigning champion of the competition is Argentine club Independiente, who defeated Brazilian club Flamengo in the most recent final.<br><br>Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with eight while containing the largest number of different winning teams, with a total of six clubs having won the title. The cup has been won by 11 different clubs. Argentine clubs Boca Juniors and Independiente are the most successful clubs in the cup's history, having won the tournament twice, with Boca Juniors being the only one to achieve it back-to-back, in 2004 and 2005.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"3"

It is contested by 16 clubs and operates on a promotion and relegation system with the Kenyan National Super League. Gor Mahia are the league's current champions and most successful club, with a record 15 titles to their name.<br><br>The league was mostly stable until the late 1990s and since then its performance had been considered below average, with many of the league's clubs having little or no finances to support themselves. "classic2.soccer.league.fra"	"Resultats pour Ligue 1. France Football League"	"500"	"4.2"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Suivez la ligue de football français! Ligue 1 Conforama!<br><br>Interface facile à utiliser et simple.<br><br>- Scores en direct et résultats<br>- Classement et classements<br>- Scores et détails des buts<br>- Tous les matchs d'une équipe avec un clic<br>- Informations sur un joueur, comme quand les matchs quand il a marqué<br>- Saisons précédentes - statistiques des dernières années<br><br>Ligue 1, également appelée Ligue 1 Conforama pour des raisons de parrainage avec Conforama,  est une ligue professionnelle française pour les clubs de football masculins. Au sommet du système de ligue de football français, c'est la compétition de football primaire du pays. Administrée par la Ligue de Football Professionnel, la Ligue 1 est disputée par 20 clubs et opère sur un système de promotion et de relégation avec la Ligue 2.<br><br>Les saisons vont d'août à mai. Les équipes jouent 38 matches chacune (jouant deux équipes dans la ligue deux fois, à domicile et à l'extérieur), totalisant 38 matches dans la saison. La plupart des jeux sont joués les samedis et dimanches, avec quelques jeux joués pendant les soirs de semaine. Le jeu est régulièrement suspendu le dernier week-end avant Noël pendant deux semaines avant de revenir dans la deuxième semaine de janvier. La Ligue 1 est l'une des premières ligues nationales, actuellement classée cinquième en Europe derrière la Liga espagnole, la Premier League anglaise, la Serie A italienne et la Bundesliga allemande. <br><br><br>La Ligue 1 a été inaugurée le 11 septembre 1932 sous le nom de National avant de passer à la Division 1 après une année d'existence. Le nom a duré jusqu'en 2002 avant de passer à son nom actuel. L'AS Saint-Étienne est le club le plus titré avec dix titres de champion en France tandis que l'Olympique Lyonnais est le club qui a remporté le plus de titres consécutifs (sept entre 2002 et 2008). Avec 68 saisons en Ligue 1, l'Olympique de Marseille détient le record de la plupart des saisons parmi l'élite, tandis que le FC Nantes et le Paris Saint-Germain tiennent le record de longévité avec 44 saisons consécutives (respectivement 1963-2007 et 1974 jusqu'à au moins 2018). Les champions actuels sont le Paris Saint-Germain, qui a remporté son septième titre lors de la saison 2017-18.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"4"

[2]<br><br>מאז 1923, 14 מועדונים הוכתרו אלופי מערכת הכדורגל הישראלית. מתוך שבעת המועדונים שהתחרו מאז היווסדה של הליגה הישראלית ב -1999 זכו בשבע התואר: בית""ר ירושלים (פעמיים), הפועל באר שבע (פעמיים), הפועל תל אביב (פעמיים), מכבי חיפה (שבע פעמים), מכבי תל אביב (ארבע פעמים), עירוני קריית שמונה (פעם). האליפות הנוכחית הן הפועל באר שבע, שזכתה בעונת 2017-18.<br><br>Easy to use interface is simple.<br><br>- Live scores and scores<br>Tables and ranking<br>- scorers and goals details<br>- All games of the team with a click<br>- Information about a player, like when matches when he scored<br>Previous seasons <br>- Statistical data from recent years<br><br>The Israeli Premier League (Hebrew: ליגת העל‬, Ligat HaAl, lit. The Super League), commonly known as Ligat Winner (Hebrew: ליגת ווינר‬) for sponsorship reasons with Toto Winner [1], is an Israeli professional league for association football clubs. It is the highest tier of the professional Israeli football league system. Administrated by the Israel Football Association (IFA), Ligat is contested by 14 clubs, it operates on a system of promotion and relegation with Liga Leumit. Seasons run from August to May, with teams playing 32 matches each, totalling 224 matches in the season. Five games are played on Saturdays, with one game played on Sundays and one game on Mondays.<br><br>The competition formed on 1999 following the decision of the Israel Football Association to form a new league. It is also ranked eighteenth in the UEFA coefficients of leagues based on performances in European competitions over the last five years, ahead of the Cypriot First Division and Rominian's Liga I.[2]<br><br>Since 1923, a total of 14 clubs have been crowned champions of the Israeli football system. Of the twenty-seven clubs to have competed since the inception of the Israeli Premier League in 1999, seven have won the title: Beitar Jerusalem (twice), Hapoel Be'er Sheva (twice), Hapoel Tel Aviv (twice), Maccabi Haifa (seven times), Maccabi Tel Aviv (four times), and Ironi Kiryat Shmona (once). The current champions are Hapoel Be'er Sheva, who won the 2017–18 season.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"4"

There was also a lack of awareness in Zimbabwean fisheries relating to catch and release and sustainable harvest, be it from a social fishing aspect all the way up to tournament level angling.<br><br>Keepnet offers three solutions to bring about a much-needed change:<br><br>Keepnet – A social media platform for fishing.<br>Keepnet, is a place to create awareness relating to catch and release and sustainable harvest. Anglers can easily share their catch and release videos and photos. The social media platform is also a place to educate anglers on the dos, don’ts, and laws that govern our relevant fisheries.<br><br>Keepnet Pro – An app based tournament fishing solutions.<br>Keepnet Pro, is an app based tournament scoring solution, that can be used either at a social level or as a full tournament scoring solution. It focuses on catch score and release and is helping reduce the impact on the fish and the fisheries<br><br>Keepnet Weigh Bay – Tournament weigh bay solutions.<br>Keepnet Weigh Bay, is a system that looks to modernise the current tournament weigh bay. "com.ac.C22R45A1"	"SG Siemens Karlsruhe"	"100"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">1951 wurde eine Siemens Betriebssportgruppe gegründet, nachdem aus der Belegschaft der Siemens AG, Karlsruhe der Wunsch nach Sportmöglichkeiten laut wurde. Weil kein geeigneter Sportplatz zur Verfügung stand, wurde mit dem Karlsruher Fußballverein e.V. (KFV) ein Vertrag geschlossen, so daß die ""Siemens-Sportgruppe im KFV""entstand.<br>Diese Betriebssportgruppe hatte einen eigenen Vorstand, dessen Vorsitzende Dir. Erich Kirsten und Herbert Gnädig gleichzeitig im Vorstand des KFV als Beisitzer die Interessen der Betriebssportgruppe vertraten. Es bildeten sich dabei folgende Gruppen: Fußball, Faustball, Skilauf, Ringtennis, Tischtennis, Leichtathletik, Reiten und Damengymnastik. Über den KFV waren die Sportler der Betriebssportgruppe der deutschen Sportbewegung angeschlossen und so auf allen Sportfesten startberechtigt und gegen Sportunfall versichert. Sie wurden als Mitglieder namentlich beim KFV geführt.<br>1961 wurde von der Stadt Karlsruhe ein geeignetes Gelände in Erbpacht erworben und so ausgebaut, daß Rasenspielfelder, Allwetterspielfelder, 400 m Rundbahn und Umkleideräume entstanden. Im November 1963 wurde dann ein eigener Verein - die Sportgemeinschaft Siemens Karlsruhe - gegründet und ins Vereinsregister als e.V. eingetragen. Diese Sportgemeinschaft wurde Mitglied des Badischen Sportbundes und allen seinen Unterverbänden und dem Deutschen Sportbund als Dachorganisation. Damit war die Möglichkeit geschaffen, daß die Sportler - entsprechend ihrer Leistung - am Sportgeschehen in den Verbänden teilnehmen konnten.<br>Am Tage der Gründung der Sportgemeinschaft Siemens Karlsruhe e.V. waren 296 Belegschaftsmitglieder in der Siemens Sportgruppe, die dem KFV angeschlossen war. Ab der Einweihung der eigenen Sportanlage stieg das Interesse der sportlichen Betätigung unserer Belegschaft sprunghaft an, wobei die Sportgemeinschaft heute der fünftgrößte Verein in der Fächerstatd unter rund 200 Vereinen mit über 2.400 Mitgliedern zählt.<br> <br>Jede Woche sind ca. 2.200 Sportler bei der Sportgemeinschaft Siemens aktiv. "com.acesportsapps.soccerteammate"	"Soccer Teammate"	"1000"	"4.4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Soccer Teammate is a soccer team management application for youth soccer coaches. It is easy and fun to use, whilst being a powerful productivity tool for anyone involved in coaching youth soccer at any age or level.<br><br>Record key game events in real-time. These include goals, assists, shots (on and off target), saves, crosses, corner kicks, substitutions, fouls, offsides, penalty goals and misses, yellow and red cards, own goals. Playing position and formation changes can also be recorded.<br><br>Track playing time for each player and statistics for all events during a game. Overall and individual player statistics, including playing time, can be viewed and filtered by team, competition, season and opponent. Team records can be viewed for all games and similarly filtered.<br><br>Directly manipulate team line-ups and formations for maximum flexibility and ease of use. For example, during an 11-a-side game, 4-4-2 can quickly be changed to 4-3-3 simply by dragging a player from midfield to attack or alternatively to 4-5-1 by dragging a player from attack to midfield. Substitutions can be made by dragging players to and from the bench.<br><br>Define multiple competitions, each with their own game format, including the number of players and substitutes, the number of periods and their duration and whether they can go to overtime and/or a penalty shootout if the score is level. "com.aktivKONZEPTE.mobilepointak"	"mobilePOINT (aktivSYSTEM)"	"100"	"5"	"<div jsname=""sngebd""><b>mobilePOINT (aktivSYSTEM)</b><br><br>Der mobilePOINT ist die mobile Managementzentrale für die Nutzer des aktivSYSTEMs. <br>Durch ihn ist der Trainer jederzeit für den Kunden mittels Trainerruf-Funktion erreichbar.<br>Der Trainer hat über ein mobiles Gerät (Smartphone, Tablet, etc.) von überall direkten Zugriff auf die Stamm- und Trainingsdaten seiner Kunden. Trainingspläne können mit dem mobilePOINT direkt auf der Trainingsfläche erstellt und bearbeitet werden. Der Zugriff auf den gesamten Übungskatalog ist hierbei ebenso selbstverständlich, wie die Möglichkeit der Anwendung von Trainingsplan und –Parametervorlagen. Durch den Einsatz des mobilePOINTs reduziert sich die Arbeitszeit des Trainers am Schreibtisch – der Trainer kann stattdessen direkt auf der Trainingsfläche präsent sein und steht als Ansprechpartner für die Trainierenden zur Verfügung.<br><br><b>Voraussetzungen</b><br>Die mobilePOINT (aktivSYSTEM) APP ist nur einsetzbar in Verbindung mit folgenden Produkten der aktivKONZEPTE AG:<br>• aktivSYSTEM Enterprise 3 (ab Version 3)<br>• aktivSYSTEM Professional 3 (ab Version 3)<br>• aktivSYSTEM Standard 3 (ab Version 3)<br><br><br><b>FEATURES</b> *nicht alle Features stehen in allen Editionen zur Verfügung<br><br><i>ALLGEMEIN</i><br>• Empfang von „Trainerrufen” der Kunden (mit Kundenbild) von servicePOINT, exercisePOINT und groupPOINT <br>• Empfang von „Trainerrufen” der Kunden (mit Kundenbild) vom workoutPOINT<br><br><i>KUNDENDATEN</i><br>• Ansicht und Bearbeitung der Kundenstammdaten<br>• Ansicht und Bearbeitung der Kundenrechte<br><br><i>TRAINING</i><br>• Erstellung und Bearbeitung von Trainingsplänen<br>• Anwendung von Zyklus-, Trainingsplan- und Parametervorlagen<br>• Zugriff auf den gesamten Übungskatalog<br>• Einfügen und Löschen von Übungen im Trainingsplan<br>• Freischalten bereits absolvierter Übungen <br>• Verlängerung/Bearbeitung von aktuellen Trainingsplänen und Trainingszyklen<br><br><i>MONITORING</i><br>• Anzeige der aktuell Trainierenden an den Trainingsgeräten<br>• Anzeige der aktuell Trainierenden an den userPOINTs</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"1"

"com.alester229.parkrunutilities"	"Stopwatch & Scanner"	"1000"	"4.8"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Stopwatch &amp; Scanner are a set of tools designed to make your Saturday morning parkrun run smoother. It is designed with event teams in mind but can be used by anyone.  <br><br>There is a scanner that uses the camera facility on your phone to scan both position tokens and personal bar-codes, (it doesn't matter what order you scan them in). When a pair of bar-codes (position and athlete) are collected they are stored on a local table that can be viewed via the 'Results' section of the app.<br><br>A stopwatch enables the user to record an unlimited number of runners and outputs a file that works seamlessly with the results processing servers. The stopwatch uses the volume buttons to 'click' through results giving immediate feedback and listing runners times as they are logged, perfect for checking the times are in sync with the finish tokens.<br><br>Token Support is a simple form to submit entries manually for those bar-codes that don't scan properly. As all events are instructed to only manually process results for those runners who have their bar-codes but will not scan only these two fields are available by default. Additional information can be assigned to an athlete by toggling the 'Details' button. This information, like that from the scanner is stored in a local table on the phone. <br><br>The data logged from both the 'Scanner' and 'Finish Tokens Support' is stored in the same table so if required the same phone can be used to perform two functions. When all runners results have been collected, data can be reviewed in the 'Results' section of the app. The data can then be either saved to a text file locally, sent as a text file via email or uploaded to a dropbox folder. The text files can then be uploaded to the webFMS as you would the normal scanner text files. Note: only entries with both an athlete number &amp; a position will be uploaded.   <br><br>Stopwatch &amp; Scanner has been developed solely by a parkrun enthusiast and is in no way affiliated with the parkrun organisation or UKTT.<br><br>Stopwatch &amp; Scanner will only work on devices running Android 4.0 (Jelly Bean) and above. The app uses the device camera to scan bar-codes. In older devices the cameras tend not to be good enough or fast enough to scan in a timely fashion. <br><br>Permissions:<br>We ask for permission to use your camera in-order to scan the bar-codes.<br>We ask for permission to store the files to your phone so that they can be either emailed, sent to Dropbox or downloaded to your PC via a cable.</div>"	"0.00"	"Sports"	"49"
